original_text: But in the seventh month of the year, Nethaniah's son Ishmael went to Mizpah to visit Ahikam's son Gedaliah. Ishmael was the grandson of Elishama who belonged to the royal family. He had been an officer who served King Zedekiah. Ishmael brought ten of his men with him. They were all eating a meal with Gedaliah in Mizpah.
korean_text: 일곱째 달에 왕의 종친 엘리사마의 손자요 느다냐의 아들로서 왕의 장관인 이스마엘이 열 사람과 함께 미스바로 가서 아히감의 아들 그다랴에게 이르러 미스바에서 함께 떡을 먹다가

sentences.original_text: But in the seventh month of the year
Nethaniah's son Ishmael went to Mizpah
Ishmael was the grandson of Elishama
who belonged to the royal family
Ishmael brought ten of his men with him
sentences.korean_translation: 이스마엘은 자기 사람 열 명을 데려왔습니다

sentences.original_text: They were all eating a meal with Gedaliah
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 모두 그달리야와 함께 식사를 하고 있었습니다
